column4: I've installed PHP5 and Apache 2 under Ubuntu 7 - can someone tell me what to add to httpd.conf so that Apache uses the PHP module?
use apt?  it just works if you do
I got both of them the normal way, but putting a simple phpinfo(); in the home directory, trying to load that script in a browser is no dice
define "normal"  does "normal" entail apt-get install blahblah?
